home.hero_title: Integrated Creative Solutions for Your Project's Success
home.hero_desc: Qalaj is a comprehensive Egyptian company providing integrated creative solutions for businesses and educational institutions.
home.methodology_desc: We provide integrated services in graphic design, printing, web development, and supplies with the highest quality standards and best prices.

footer.about: Qalaj is a comprehensive Egyptian company providing integrated creative solutions for businesses and educational institutions in design, printing, web development, and supplies.

our_work.title: Our Work
our_work.meta_title: Our Work | Qalaj - Portfolio & Success Stories
our_work.meta_desc: Explore Qalaj's portfolio of creative projects in web development, printing, and design. See how we deliver outstanding results for businesses and institutions.
our_work.heading: Our Portfolio & Success Stories
our_work.intro: Discover a selection of our most impactful projects, showcasing our expertise in web development, printing, and graphic design. Each project reflects our commitment to quality, creativity, and client satisfaction.

projects.name: Brand Identity for NileTech
projects.desc: Developed a complete brand identity, including logo, business cards, and digital assets for a leading tech company in Cairo.

projects.name: E-commerce Website for Lotus Store
projects.desc: Designed and built a responsive online store with integrated payment solutions, boosting sales by 40%.

projects.name: Educational Brochure Printing
projects.desc: Produced high-quality brochures for a major educational institution, ensuring vibrant colors and fast delivery.

about_us.title: About Us
about_us.meta_title: About Qalaj | Creative Solutions Company in Egypt
about_us.meta_desc: Learn about Qalaj, a leading Egyptian company specializing in creative solutions for design, printing, web development, and business supplies.
about_us.heading: Who We Are
about_us.content: Qalaj is a multidisciplinary creative agency based in Egypt, dedicated to empowering businesses and educational institutions with innovative solutions. Our team combines expertise in graphic design, printing, web development, and supplies to deliver integrated services that drive success. We believe in quality, creativity, and building lasting partnerships with our clients.
about_us.mission: Our mission is to provide comprehensive, high-quality creative services that help our clients stand out and grow in a competitive market.
about_us.vision: To be the leading provider of creative solutions in Egypt and the region, known for our reliability, innovation, and client-centric approach.

web_development.title: Web Development
web_development.meta_desc: Professional web development services by Qalaj. We build modern, responsive websites and custom web applications for businesses and organizations.
web_development.heading: Modern Web Development
web_development.content: Our web development team creates high-performance websites and web applications tailored to your business needs. From corporate sites to e-commerce platforms, we use the latest technologies to ensure security, speed, and scalability.
web_development.card_desc: Modern, responsive websites and web applications built with cutting-edge technologies

printing.title: Printing
printing.meta_desc: High-quality printing services by Qalaj. We offer business cards, brochures, banners, and more with fast turnaround and premium materials.
printing.heading: Premium Printing Solutions
printing.content: Qalaj delivers top-notch printing services for all your business needs. Whether you need marketing materials, office stationery, or promotional banners, we guarantee vibrant colors, sharp details, and timely delivery.
printing.card_desc: High-quality printing services with fast delivery for all your business needs

designing.title: Graphic Design
designing.meta_desc: Creative graphic design services by Qalaj. We craft logos, branding, social media designs, and marketing materials that make your business stand out.
designing.heading: Creative Graphic Design
designing.content: Our talented designers bring your ideas to life with visually stunning graphics. From brand identities to social media content, we ensure every design communicates your message and enhances your brand image.
designing.card_desc: Creative graphic design solutions that make your brand stand out

supplies.card_desc: Premium office and educational supplies at competitive prices

contact_us.title: Contact Us
contact_us.meta_title: Contact Qalaj | Get in Touch for Creative Solutions
contact_us.meta_desc: Contact Qalaj for professional design, printing, and web development services in Egypt. We are ready to help your business grow.
contact_us.heading: Get in Touch
contact_us.intro: We are here to answer your questions and help you achieve your goals. Fill out the form or use the contact details below to reach us.
